Landing.title: Let's climb together
Landing.text2: Find bouldering competitions in the future and current

card1.title: Our Mission:
card1.text1_2: , we are passionate about making the world of bouldering more accessible, exciting, and community-driven.
card1.text2: Our mission is to connect climbers with the best competitions, allowing them to register, stay informed, and track their progress all in one place.
card1.text3: Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting, we aim to provide a platform that fosters growth, challenges, and unforgettable experiences.

card2.title: Discover and Compete:
card2.text1: Bouldering is more than just a sport; it's a way to test your limits and push past boundaries.
card2.text2_1: Our platform allows you to easily find upcoming competitions and
card2.text2_2: that match your skill level and passion.
card2.text3: Stay up-to-date on local and global bouldering events and never miss an opportunity to compete, challenge yourself, and meet others who share your love for climbing.

card3.title: Explore Boulder Halls:
card3.text1: We understand that finding the right training environment is essential to improving your climbing skills.
card3.text2_1: That's why we offer an extensive overview offer
card3.text2_2: across the area, helping you find the perfect place to train, meet other climbers, and prepare for your next competition.
card3.text3: Whether you're looking for a beginner-friendly space or a gym with challenging routes, we've got you covered.

step1.title: Scan the QR code
step1.bullet1: At the entrance of the event you will find the QR code of the app.
step1.bullet2: Scan the code and enter the login page

step2.title: Login to your account
step2.bullet1: The QR code will lead you to the login page of app

LoginBanner.title: Find your event and login
LoginBanner.text1: Connect to your boulder app account, register your score and compete with others
